# Transaction.estimateGasCost() method

Estimate the total gas cost of this transaction (in both ether and wei)

**Signature:**

```typescript
estimateGasCost(): Promise<{
        ether: string;
        wei: BigNumber;
    }>;
```

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;{ ether: string; wei: BigNumber; }&gt;
